author: pietverwilligen
body:
Addendum to PR9083 for GEMCSCSegment:
- fixed a customization (no more tracked to connect to condition db)
- added Buildfile in test directory
- fixed the initialization of std::unique_ptr

ideally should be backported also to 75X, but it has rather low priority I guess.
title: Gemcsc segment 75 x pr v3 addendum
